languages.text: "Вольный Торговец, минуту вашего внимания. Я хотел сообщить, что Глейто останется на борту флагмана, пока я буду выполнять миссию для Администратума".
"A minute of your time, Rogue Trader. I wanted to inform you that Glaito will be staying aboard your ship while I am away on my mission for the Administratum."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец, минуту вашего внимания. Я хотел сообщить, что Глейто останется на борту флагмана, пока я буду выполнять миссию для Администратума".

traits.locale_text: "A minute of your time, Rogue Trader. I wanted to inform you that Glaito will be staying aboard your ship while I am preoccupied with my mission for the Administratum."
"A minute of your time, Rogue Trader. I wanted to inform you that Glaito will be staying aboard your ship while I am preoccupied with my mission for the Administratum."
"A minute of your time, Rogue Trader. I wanted to inform you that Glaito will be staying aboard your ship while I am away on my mission for the Administratum."
"A minute of your time, Rogue Trader. I wanted to inform you that Glaito will be staying aboard your ship while I am away on my mission for the Administratum."
"A minute of your time, Rogue Trader. I wanted to inform you that Glaito will be staying aboard your ship while I am away on my mission for the Administratum."
"A minute of your time, Rogue Trader. I wanted to inform you that Glaito will be staying aboard your ship while I am away on my mission for the Administratum."

languages.text: "Eine Minute Eurer Zeit, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." Ich wollte Euch informieren, dass Glaito an Bord Eures Schiffes bleibt, während ich auf meiner Mission für das Administratum bin."
languages.original_text: "A minute of your time, Rogue Trader. I wanted to inform you that Glaito will be staying aboard your ship while I am away on my mission for the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Minute Eurer Zeit, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." Ich wollte Euch informieren, dass Glaito an Bord Eures Schiffes bleibt, während ich auf meiner Mission für das Administratum bin."

languages.text: « Accordez-moi un instant, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je voulais vous informer que Glaito restera à bord de votre vaisseau pendant que j'effectuerai ma mission pour l'Administratum. »
languages.original_text: "A minute of your time, Rogue Trader. I wanted to inform you that Glaito will be staying aboard your ship while I am away on my mission for the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: « Accordez-moi un instant, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je voulais vous informer que Glaito restera à bord de votre vaisseau pendant que j'effectuerai ma mission pour l'Administratum. »

languages.text: “耽误你一分钟时间，行商浪人。我想告知你，我在执行涉及内政部的任务期间，格雷托会留在你的船上。”
languages.original_text: "A minute of your time, Rogue Trader. I wanted to inform you that Glaito will be staying aboard your ship while I am away on my mission for the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: “耽误你一分钟时间，行商浪人。我想告知你，我在执行涉及内政部的任务期间，格雷托会留在你的船上。”

languages.text: «Permítame un momento, Comerciante Independiente. Quería informarle de que Glaito permanecerá a bordo de su nave mientras estoy en la misión del Administratum».
languages.original_text: "A minute of your time, Rogue Trader. I wanted to inform you that Glaito will be staying aboard your ship while I am away on my mission for the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: «Permítame un momento, Comerciante Independiente. Quería informarle de que Glaito permanecerá a bordo de su nave mientras estoy en la misión del Administratum».

languages.text: 「少しお時間を、ローグトレーダー。お知らせがあります。私が帝国行政局の任務で不在の間、グライトは貴船に滞在します」
languages.original_text: "A minute of your time, Rogue Trader. I wanted to inform you that Glaito will be staying aboard your ship while I am away on my mission for the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: 「少しお時間を、ローグトレーダー。お知らせがあります。私が帝国行政局の任務で不在の間、グライトは貴船に滞在します」

languages.text: "Bir dakikanızı rica ederim Hür Tacir. Administratum namına göreve giderken Glaito geminizde kalacak, bunu bildirmek istedim."
languages.original_text: "A minute of your time, Rogue Trader. I wanted to inform you that Glaito will be staying aboard your ship while I am away on my mission for the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: "Bir dakikanızı rica ederim Hür Tacir. Administratum namına göreve giderken Glaito geminizde kalacak, bunu bildirmek istedim."
